text:
I tried to refine to messages starting with "ERROR " and tried all these variants:

MSG like '^ERROR .*'
MSG like "^ERROR .*"
MSG like /^ERROR .*/
MSG like ^ERROR .*

Also with capital "LIKE"

Could you please describe in the documentation how the regular expressions are supposed to be entered so that they work?
creator: asf.for.skeeve@xoxy.net
